item.title: US announces first new aid package to Ukraine in months, worth $300 million, saying new funding comes from savings in weapons... (LiveUAMap)
item.description: US announces first new aid package to Ukraine in months, worth $300 million, saying new funding comes from savings in weapons contracts. Asked why this wasn't done sooner, a senior defense official said, “We weren’t broke at the time, but now we are.”
